simple_stats_with_renaming.search: index="idx" | stats count values(host) as hosts_list by sourcetype

simple_stats_with_renaming_and_args.search: index="idx" | stats partitions=2 delim="." count values(host) as hosts_list by sourcetype

simple_stats_with_wrong_args.search: index="idx" | stats delimiter=2 count values(host) as hosts_list by sourcetype

splunk_accum.search: sourcetype=access_* status=200 categoryId=STRATEGY | chart count AS views by productId | accum views as TotalViews

splunk_addcoltotals_2.search: sourcetype=access_* | table userId bytes avgTime duration | addcoltotals bytes duration

splunk_addcoltotals_4.search: index=_internal source="metrics.log" group=pipeline | stats avg(cpu_seconds) by processor | addcoltotals labelfield=processor

splunk_accum_2.search: index=idx | stats latest(_time) AS latest_time BY host | addinfo | eval latest_age = info_max_time - latest_time | fields - info_* | inputlookup append=t expected_hosts | fillnull value=9999 latest_age | dedup host | where latest_age > 42

splunk_addtotals_1.search: source="addtotalsData.csv" | chart sum(sales) BY products quarter | addtotals

splunk_addtotals_4.search: source="addtotalsData.csv" | stats sum(quota) by quarter| addtotals row=f col=t labelfield=quarter sum(quota)

splunk_addtotals_5.search: source="addtotalsData.csv" | chart sum(sales) by products quarter| addtotals col=t labelfield=products label="Quarterly Totals" fieldname="Product Totals"

splunk_anomalies_4.search: index=_internal | anomalies BY group | search group=*

splunk_anomalydetection_5.search: index=_internal | anomalydetection method=iqr action=tf param=4 uselower=true mark=true

splunk_append_1.search: source=usgs place=*California* | stats count by magType | append [search index=usgs_* source=usgs place=*California* | stats count]

splunk_append_2.search: sourcetype=access_* action=purchase | stats dc(clientip) BY categoryId | append [search sourcetype=access_* action=purchase | top 1 clientip BY categoryId] | table categoryId, dc(clientip), clientip, count

splunk_append_3.search: sourcetype=access_* | stats dc(clientip), count by method | append maxtime=30 maxout=1000 [search sourcetype=access_* | top 1 clientip by method]

splunk_append_4.search: index=_internal earliest=11/20/2017:00:00:00 latest=11/30/2017:00:00:00 |append extendtimerange=true [search index=_audit earliest=11/1/2017:00:00:00 latest=11/25/2017:00:00:00] |timechart span=1d count

splunk_appendcol_2.search: index=idx | stats dc(userID) as totalUsers | appendcols [ search index=idx AND "text" | addinfo | where _time >= info_min_time AND _time <=info_max_time | stats count(field) as variableA ] | eval variableB = exact(variableA/totalUsers)

splunk_appendpipe.search: index=_audit | stats count by action user | appendpipe [stats sum(count) as count by action | eval user = "TOTAL - ALL USERS"] | sort action

splunk_arules_2.search: index=idx | arules sup=3 conf=.6 field1 field2 field3

splunk_associate_1.search: sourcetype=access_* status!=200 | fields method, status | associate improv=0.05 | table Reference_Key, Reference_Value, Target_Key, Top_Conditional_Value, Description

splunk_autoregress_1.search: index=idx | autoregress ip AS old_ip p=3

splunk_autoregress_3.search: index=idx | eval rawlen=len(_raw) | autoregress rawlen p=1-4 | eval moving_average=(rawlen + rawlen_p1 + rawlen_p2 + rawlen_p3 +rawlen_p4 ) /5

splunk_bin_1.search: index=idx | bin _time span=5m | stats avg(thruput) by _time host

splunk_bin_2.search: index=idx | bin size bins=10 | stats count(_raw) by size

splunk_bucketdir.search: index=idx | top source | bucketdir pathfield=source sizefield=count maxcount=10

splunk_chart_2.search: index=idx | chart max(delay) OVER foo BY bar

splunk_chart_3.search: index=idx | chart eval(avg(size)/max(delay)) AS ratio BY host user

splunk_chart_4.search: index=idx | chart max(delay) BY size bins=10

splunk_chart_6.search: index=idx | chart count BY date_mday span=3 date_hour span=12

splunk_chart_8.search: index=idx | chart avg(field) BY mvfield dedup_splitvals=true

splunk_chart_9.search: source="addtotalsData.csv" | chart sum(sales) BY products quarter

splunk_chart_10.search: sourcetype=access_* | chart count(eval(method="GET")) AS GET, count(eval(method="POST")) AS POST by host

splunk_chart_11.search: sourcetype=access_* status=200 action=purchase | transaction clientip maxspan=10m | chart count BY duration span=log2

splunk_chart_12.search: sourcetype=access_* status=200 action=purchase | transaction clientip maxspan=30m | chart avg(eventcount) by duration span=log2

splunk_chart_13.search: sourcetype=access_* status=200 action=purchase | chart dc(clientip) OVER date_hour BY categoryId usenull=f

splunk_chart_14.search: source=all_month.csv place=*alaska* mag>=3.5 | chart count BY mag place useother=f | rename mag AS Magnitude

splunk_cluster_1.search: index=_internal source=*splunkd.log* log_level!=info | cluster showcount=t | table cluster_count _raw | sort -cluster_count

splunk_cluster_2.search: index=idx | cluster t=0.9 showcount=t | sort - cluster_count | head 20

splunk_cluster_3.search: index=idx | cluster labelonly=t showcount=t | sort - cluster_count, cluster_label, _time | dedup 5 cluster_label

splunk_collect_2.search: index=mysummary | eval country_source=if(REMOTE_IP_country_code="US","domestic","foreign") | bin _time span=1h | stats count by _time,vpn_action,country_source | addinfo | collect index=mysummary marker="summary_type=vpn, summary_span=3600, summary_method=bin, search_name=\"vpn starts and stops\""

splunk_concurrency_1.search: index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd_ui_access | eval spent_in_seconds = spent / 1000 | concurrency duration=spent_in_seconds

splunk_concurrency_4.search: sourcetype=access_* | transaction JSESSIONID clientip startswith="view" endswith="purchase" | concurrency duration=duration | eval duration=tostring(duration,"duration")

splunk_contingency_1.search: source=all_month.csv | contingency mag depth | sort mag

splunk_convert_7.search: index=idx source="all_month.csv" | convert timeformat="%H:%M:%S" ctime(_time) AS c_time | table _time, c_time

splunk_convert_8.search: sourcetype=syslog | convert mstime(_time) AS ms_time | table _time, ms_time

splunk_convert_9.search: index=idx | convert num(time_elapsed) | stats sum(eval(time_elapsed/60)) AS Minutes BY user_id

splunk_datamodel_5.search: | datamodel Tutorial Client_errors search | search Tutorial.status=404 | stats count

splunk_datamodel_6.search: | datamodel Tutorial summariesonly=true search | timechart span=1h count

splunk_dbinspect_3.search: | dbinspect index=_internal | stats count by splunk_server

splunk_dbinspect_4.search: | dbinspect index=_internal | eval GB=sizeOnDiskMB/1024| stats sum(GB)

splunk_delta_1.search: sourcetype=tv activity="View" | sort - _time | delta _time AS timeDeltaS | eval timeDeltaS=abs(timeDeltaS) | stats sum(timeDeltaS) by ChannelName

splunk_delta_4.search: sourcetype=access_* status=200 action=purchase | top clientip | delta count p=1

splunk_delta_5.search: source=all_month.csv place=*alaska* | delta _time p=1 | rename delta(_time) AS timeDeltaS | eval timeDeltaS=abs(timeDeltaS) | eval "Time Between Quakes"=tostring(timeDeltaS,"duration") | table place, _time, "Time Between Quakes"

splunk_delta_6.search: sourcetype=access_* | transaction JSESSIONID clientip startswith="view" endswith="purchase" | delta _time AS timeDelta p=1 | eval timeDelta=abs(timeDelta) | eval timeDelta=tostring(timeDelta,"duration")

splunk_erex_3.search: sourcetype=secure* port "failed password" | erex port examples="port 3351, port 3768" | top port

splunk_eventstats_1.search: host=www1 | transaction clientip host maxspan=30s maxpause=5s | eventstats avg(duration) AS avgdur

splunk_eventstats_2.search: host=www1 | transaction clientip host maxspan=30s maxpause=5s | eventstats avg(duration) As avgdur BY date_minute

splunk_eventstats_3.search: eventtype="error" | eventstats avg(bytes) AS avg | where bytes>avg

splunk_eventstats_4.search: | makeresults count=4 | streamstats count | eval age = case(count=1, 25, count=2, 39, count=3, 31, count=4, "test") | eval city = case(count=1 OR count=3, "San Francisco", count=2 OR count=4, "Seattle") | eventstats allnum=true avg(age) BY city

splunk_streamstats_1.search: | makeresults count=3 | streamstats count | eval test=if(count==2,"yes","no") | streamstats count as testCount reset_after="("match(test,"yes")")"

splunk_streamstats_3.search: index=idx | streamstats avg(foo) by bar window=5 global=f

splunk_streamstats_5.search: sourcetype=access_combined* | head 5 |sort _time | streamstats sum(bytes) AS ASimpleSumOfBytes BY clientip

splunk_streamstats_6.search: eventtype="download" | bin _time span=1d as day | stats values(clientip) as ips dc(clientip) by day | streamstats dc(ips) as "Cumulative total"

splunk_streamstats_7.search: index=idx | timechart span=1h sum(bytes) as SumOfBytes | streamstats global=f sum(*) as accu_total_*

splunk_top_3.search: sourcetype=access_* status=200 action=purchase | top 1 productName by categoryId showperc=f countfield=total
